summary: This release brings Grove's AI-powered terminology to life, introducing interactive GroveTerms that make the platform more intuitive to explore. We've polished the authentication experience with passkey support and magic links, while migrating our payments to Stripe for a smoother billing process. Under the hood, we've unified our tools and terminology to create a more cohesive and delightful experience across your garden.
